leads.lead_text: Spikes sub-cylindrical, aggregate but not contracted into capitate or sub-capitate clusters; peduncles not glandular; corolla-tube rarely twice as long as calyx
Spikes contracted into capitate or sub-capitate clusters; peduncles with minute sparse glands intermixed with hairs; corolla-tube mostly twice as long as calyx
